import client from'./client';// 로그인
export var login=function login(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password;return client.post('/api/auth/login',{username:username,password:password});};// 회원가입
export var register=function register(_ref2){var username=_ref2.username,password=_ref2.password;return client.post('/api/auth/register',{username:username,password:password});};// 로그인 상태 확인
export var check=function check(){return client.get('/api/auth/check');};export var logout=function logout(){return client.post('/api/auth/logout');};
